mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.rating, r.content, r.is_deleted AS isDeleted, r.user_id AS userId, u.nickname AS nickname, r.spot_id AS spotId, DATE_FORMAT(r.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS createdAt, r.modified_at AS modifiedAt, COUNT(rl.id) AS helpful_count FROM reviews r JOIN users u ON r.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN reviews_likes rl ON r.id = rl.review_id AND rl.is_deleted = 'F' WHERE r.spot_id = #{spotId} AND r.is_deleted = 'F' GROUP BY r.id, r.rating, r.content, r.is_deleted, r.user_id, u.nickname, r.spot_id, r.created_at, r.modified_at ORDER BY r.created_at DESC

select r.id as review_id, s.title, CASE s.content_type WHEN 'ATTRACTION' THEN '관광지' WHEN 'FESTIVAL' THEN '축제' WHEN 'POPUP' THEN '팝업' END AS badge, date(r.created_at) as date, s.doro_addr as location, r.rating, r.content as text, s.image1 as image from reviews r join spots s on r.spot_id = s.id join users u on r.user_id = u.id where u.email = #{username}
SELECT id, rating, content, is_deleted AS isDeleted, user_id AS userId, spot_id AS spotId FROM reviews WHERE id = #{id} AND is_deleted = 'F'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reviews ( rating, content, is_deleted, user_id, spot_id ) VALUES ( #{rating}, #{content}, 'F', #{userId}, #{spotId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE reviews SET is_deleted = 'T' WHERE id = #{id} AND is_deleted = 'F'

UPDATE spots SET avg_rating = ROUND( ((IFNULL(avg_rating, 0) * IFNULL(rating_count, 0)) + #{rating}) / (IFNULL(rating_count, 0) + 1), 1 ), rating_count = IFNULL(rating_count, 0) + 1 WHERE id = #{spotId}

UPDATE spots SET rating_count = rating_count - 1, avg_rating = CASE WHEN rating_count - 1 = 0 THEN NULL ELSE ROUND( ((avg_rating * rating_count) - #{rating}) / (rating_count - 1), 1 ) END WHERE id = #{spotId}
UPDATE spots SET avg_rating = ROUND( avg_rating + ((#{newRating} - #{oldRating}) / rating_count), 1 ) WHERE id = #{spotId}
